group_1.narration: What is the best thing to do@if you come across a lost child?
In the case of human children,@you shouldn’t just take them around carelessly.
If you’re in a public facility,@calling the staff on the spot@would’ve been the right thing to do.
In this case though,@the problem is that the staff can’t see@this child in the first place!
A delusional woman carrying@an invisible lost child...@the staff would have trouble@dealing with this!

group_1.textLeft: …I said all that, but really,
I’ve already taken you along with me.

group_1.textRight: …Kyuu?

group_1.textLeft: (If, just like Kyubey, they’re only visible@to Magical Girls,)
(Then surely the person they want to see@is a Magical Girl... right?)
(Then, if I go somewhere where a lot of Magical Girls@gather,)
(Will I find a lead…?)

group_1.textRight: Kyuu…?

group_1.textLeft: Pardon me, I was just thinking.
Shall we go to a place where Magical Girls gather…?

group_1.textRight: Mokyuu kyuu!

group_1.textLeft: Nice reply!
…Though it would be even better if@it were in Japanese.

group_1.narration: Now, speaking of a place where Magical Girls gather

group_1.textLeft: Oh, hello! Welcome, Yukika♪
Is that your school uniform?@You’re not wearing your usual robe today.

group_1.textRight: Ah… yes. You mean my Black Feather robe, right?
I tore it up pretty badly the other day…@I’m trying to get a replacement.

group_1.textLeft: So that’s what happened.

group_1.narration: I’m a rank and file member@of the group “Wings of the Magius”,@who seek the salvation of Magical Girls.
In order to protect our privacy@during our Magical Girl activities,@we must use a black robe.
After all,@the Coordinator’s shop is also@frequented by regular Magical Girls.

group_1.textLeft: So, what business do you have here today?@Do you want your Soul Gem adjusted?

group_1.textRight: Ah… Not really.@Actually, I’m accompanying this lost child.

group_1.textLeft: Lost child?

group_1.textRight: Yes, I was hoping to see if anyone might know@anything about them.
It’s this child here…
[chara:301701:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock](...But, there’s no one there!?)

group_1.textLeft: …Yukika.
If you have a problem,
you could have told me about it sooner…

group_1.textRight: [chara:301701:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Tha-That’s not the case at all!
Please stop looking at me,
like I’m a pitiful madwoman with@an invisible lost child!

group_1.textLeft: Oh, you’re conscious of your symptoms?

group_1.textRight: No no, more like I’m just self-conscious.
But well, it’s true that normal people would think@that you’ve got an invisible friend.

group_1.textLeft: …It’s pretty noisy here.@Did something happen?

group_1.textRight: Ah… Yachiyo. Sorry for making you wait.
(Yachiyo… Miss Yachiyo Nanami? It’s my first time seeing her up close!)
(She’s a well-known Magical Girl from Kamihama@that even I know about!)
*gasp*…
(Actually… Where did that child go?)
(I, Yukika Nanase, have committed the blunder of@a lifetime and gotten separated from the lost child I saved!)
Which means, Miss Yakumo.
Since I’ve gotten separated from my invisibl–@visible little friend,
I shall take my leave!
What? You’re leaving already?
